name.title: Name
name.description: This key contains the name of the language used

name.title: Name
name.description: This key contains the Name of the framework used

ministry.title: Ministry
ministry.description: This key contains the ministry name. link: https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/governments/organizational-structure/ministries-organizations/ministries

enum: Energy, Mines and Low Carbon Innovation

program_area.title: Program Area
program_area.description: This key contains the program area name. ex: It could be a ministry division branch or section.

product_acronym.title: Product Acronym
product_acronym.description: This key contains the product acronym. ex: Infrastructure reporting service the acronym (IRS)

product_name.title: Product Name
product_name.description: This key contains the full product name.

product_description.title: Product Description
product_description.description: This key contains description of the product.

product_status.title: Product Status
product_status.description: Status of the product. more around this can be found here. link: https://github.com/bcgov/repomountie/blob/master/doc/lifecycle-badges.md

business_capabilities_standard.title: Business Capabilities - Standard
business_capabilities_standard.description: This key contains the business capabilities that are supported by this product.

Financial Management - Manage Invoices And Statements

business_capabilities_custom.title: Business Capabilities - Custom
business_capabilities_custom.description: This key contains the business capabilities that are supported by this product, which are not available in pick list of "Business Capabilities Standard". comma separated string with free text

backend_languages_version.title: Backend Languages with their version
backend_languages_version.description: This key contains the languages used for backends( java or erlang or golang or elixir or rust) with their version

backend_frameworks.title: Backend Frameworks
backend_frameworks.description: This key contains the frameworks used for backends( express or gin or fiber or spring boot or quarkus)

frontend_languages.title: Frontend Languages
frontend_languages.description: This key contains the frontend languages

frontend_frameworks.title: Frontend Frameworks
frontend_frameworks.description: This key contains the frontend frameworks(react or angular or vue or svelte)

hosting_platforms.title: Hosting Platforms
hosting_platforms.description: This key contains the hosting platforms used in this product

hosting_platforms_custom.title: Hosting Platforms - Custom
hosting_platforms_custom.description: This key contains the hosting platform the product is hosted on which is not available as a pick list in the Hosting Platforms. Comma separated string with free text

data_storage_platforms.title: Data Storage Platforms
data_storage_platforms.description: This key contains the data storage platforms used, relational, in-memory, spatial, document, object storage

data_storage_platforms.title: Data Storage Platforms
data_storage_platforms.description: This key contains the data storage platforms used, relational, in-memory, spatial, document, object storage

data_storage_platforms_custom.title: Data Storage Platforms - Custom
data_storage_platforms_custom.description: This key contains the data storage platforms used, relational, in-memory, spatial, document, object storage,  which is not available as a pick list in the Data Storage Platforms. Comma separated string with free text

ci_cd_tools.title: Continuous Integration and Delivery Tools
ci_cd_tools.description: This key contains the CI/CD tools used for the product. ex: GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, Helm, Kustomize

ci_cd_tools.title: Continuous Integration and Delivery Tools
ci_cd_tools.description: This key contains the CI/CD tools used for the product. ex: GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, Helm, Kustomize

ci_cd_tools_custom.title: Continuous Integration and Delivery Tools - Custom
ci_cd_tools_custom.description: This key contains the CI/CD tools used for the product. ex: GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, Helm, Kustomize,  which is not available as a pick list in the Continuous Integration and Delivery Tools. Comma separated string with free text

spatial_mapping_technologies.title: Spatial Mapping Technologies
spatial_mapping_technologies.description: This key contains the mapping technologies used in the stack(Leaflet, Geoserver, Mapbox, Openlayers, ArcGIS, Google Maps, Bing Maps, OpenStreetMap, MapLibre)

spatial_mapping_technologies.title: Spatial Mapping Technologies
spatial_mapping_technologies.description: This key contains the mapping technologies used in the stack(Leaflet, Geoserver, Mapbox, Openlayers, ArcGIS, Google Maps, Bing Maps, OpenStreetMap, MapLibre)

spatial_mapping_technologies_custom.title: Spatial Mapping Technologies - Custom
spatial_mapping_technologies_custom.description: This key contains the mapping technologies used in the stack(Leaflet, Geoserver, Mapbox, Openlayers, ArcGIS, Google Maps, Bing Maps, OpenStreetMap, MapLibre),  which is not available as a pick list in the Spatial Mapping Technologies. Comma separated string with free text

identity_authorization.title: Identity And Authorization
identity_authorization.description: This key contains the Identity Integrations and authorization components used in the stack

common_components.title: Common Components
common_components.description: This key contains the common components used in the stack, link: https://digital.gov.bc.ca/common-components

notification_standard.title: Notification Standard
notification_standard.description: This key contains the notification systems used in the stack

notification_custom.title: Notification Custom
notification_custom.description: This key contains the notification other which is to be filled if the notification does not have the option to fill in the above key

other_dependencies.title: Other Dependencies
other_dependencies.description: This key contains the external dependencies which are not outlined in above keys

product_owner.title: Product Owner
product_owner.description: This key contains the full name of one of the product owner, It must be a real person

data_custodian.title: Data Custodian
data_custodian.description: This key contains the Contact Name who is data custodian for the application/suite of applications.link https://bcgov.github.io/data-publication/pages/dsg_bcdc_roles_responsibilities.html#am-i-a-data-custodian

data_steward.title: Data Steward
data_steward.description: This key contains the Contact Name who is the data steward

description: bcgovpubcode.yml is a metadata standard for repositories containing software developed or acquired by the Public Administration, aimed at making them easily discoverable and thus reusable by other entities. Fields or Sections marked with "*" are mandatory

product_information.title: Product Information *
product_information.description: This Section describes the basic information around product and is required to be filled

data_management_roles.title: Data Management Roles *
data_management_roles.description: This Section describes the information around Data Assets and is required to be filled

product_technology_information.title: Product Technology Information *
product_technology_information.description: This Section describes the basic information around tech stack used in the product and is required to be filled

product_external_dependencies.title: Product External Dependencies
product_external_dependencies.description: This Section describes the information around external dependencies which the product relies upon

version.title: BCGov Pubcode Version
version.description: This key defines which version of the yaml is being filled

title: JSON schema for bcgovpubcode.yml
